definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Marie-Thérèse was also the mother of his son Claude, and his daughter Paloma.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽后来又生了儿子克劳德和女儿帕露玛。

sentences.english: Claude is the studio's head honcho.
sentences.chinese: 克劳德是电影公司的老板。

sentences.english: That year, he married his first wife, Mary Paul MacLeod.
sentences.chinese: 这一年，他娶了他的第一任妻子玛丽保罗麦克劳德。

sentences.english: Shaking his mate's body hard, Claud wanted to wake him.
sentences.chinese: 克劳德用力摇着同伴的身体，想要唤醒他。

sentences.english: Claud quickened up, a man wouldn't give the battle.
sentences.chinese: 克劳德加快了速度，男子汉是不会认输的。

sentences.english: She is playing Mary McLeod Bethune.
sentences.chinese: 她扮演玛丽麦克劳德白求恩。

sentences.english: Claud is very good at chatting up strange girls and getting then to go out with him.
sentences.chinese: 克劳德很会与陌生姑娘闲聊亲近，并邀他们一起外出。

sentences.english: When the argument got hot, Claud chimed in .
sentences.chinese: 当争论激烈时，克劳德也参加进来了。

sentences.english: Marie was also the mother of his son Claude, and his daughter Paloma.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽后来又生了儿子克劳德和女儿帕露玛。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
